1.title: PVC windows
1.description: Our offer includes energy-efficient PVC windows which meet the highest standards on the European market. We manufacture PVC windows based on high-performance profiles from Schüco and Kömmerling.
1.alt: Private house with large white windows

2.title: Aluminium windows
2.description: We are a Polish manufacturer of aluminium windows. Made with solid and heat-insulating profiles from Aliplast and Aluron, our aluminium windows represent the highest quality in their category.
2.alt: Large private house with panoramic black windows

Doors.title: FRONT AND TERRACE DOORS – directly from a Polish manufacturer
Doors.description: All doors produced by TUR-PLAST feature solid construction, great thermal performance, and innovative solutions. We make PVC front and terrace doors based on solid profiles: Schüco CT70, Schüco LivIng82, and Kömmerling 76AD. Our aluminium doors are made with profiles from the Belgian company Aliplast as well as Polish aluminium systems from Aluron.

1.title: Hs/psk terrace doors
1.description: Low-threshold sliding terrace doors directly from the manufacturer are a perfect solution for modern and spacious interiors. They have a lot of glazing, making them able to optimally light up the room. The excellent thermal insulation and the new fittings technology make TUR-PLAST’s products bring you comfort and joy of use. Our offer includes two system solutions: HS and PSK.
1.alt: Large panoramic glass doors in the house

2.title: Pvc/aluminium front doors
2.description: The manufacture of doors with PVC or aluminium profiles occupies a separate section at TUR-PLAST. Our Salesmen will help you select the door panel colour, shape and look as well as the type of fittings and glazing.
2.alt: Black entrance door with silver hardware

RollerShutters.title: External blinds
RollerShutters.description: External blinds: top-mounted and adaptive, concealed and surface-mounted, are an effective way of saving energy. Our roller shutters will provide you with great thermal and acoustic insulation as well as a sense of intimacy and safety. We offer external roller shutters in PVC or aluminium boxes, concealed or oval surface-mounted.

1.title: Top-mounted roller shutters
1.description: We offer you a new versatile system of top-mounted roller shutters for installation on both sides, used in newly-built and renovated houses. Our EXTE roller shutter system provides excellent thermal insulation, complying with the regulations applicable on the European market.

2.title: Adaptive roller shutters
2.description: Concealed adaptive roller shutters with two modes of installation and OVAL surface-mounted adaptive roller shutters are some of our well proven products. Characterstic features of these systems include the aluminium guidebars, shutter curtain, and shutter box with a revision located outside the building.

3.title: Sun protection covers
3.description: We recommend the solid and aesthetic screen-type roller shutter systems for protecting rooms with a lot of glazing from excessive insolation. In an extended position, the screens can also be a perfect barrier against insects and various types of pollution.

WindowsPage.title: WINDOWS from Poland
WindowsPage.subtitle: functionality / comfort / aesthetics / effective thermal insulation
WindowsPage.pageDesc1: Choice of the right window is a serious decision which involves investing some money. When choosing windows, customers should make sure if the product goes well with the design of their flat or house, if its operation is convenient, if it helps to save energy, and finally if it guarantees maximum security.
WindowsPage.pageDesc2: A window is a combination of profiles, complex window panes, fittings, seals and other additional accessories. Each of the elements has a great influence on such window qualities as aesthetics, comfort, security and energy efficiency. This is why, when buying windows, it is important to pay attention to their individual elements.

1.desc: Window profiles determine the durability and tightness of the entire window structure.

2.desc: Window panes constitute about 65-85% of the whole window surface and hence, they influence significantly such window qualities as energy efficiency and security.

3.desc: Fittings and seals contribute to acoustic and thermal insulation and guarantee security and convenient operation.

4.desc: Additional accessories enhance aesthetic aspects and convenience of use.

1.title: PVC WINDOWS – Schüco Profiles
1.description: Schüco window profiles are made of very high-strength material. We use reinforcement with corrosion-resistant 1.5-2mm thick steel sections around the entire perimeter of the frame and sash. A window construction that is this stable and durable perfectly withstands the weight of the quite heavy energy-efficient triple glazing unit, and has excellent thermal and sound insulation.

2.title: PVC WINDOWS – Kömmerling Profiles
2.description: We recommend the energy-efficient and eco-friendly window systems from the German company KÖMMERLING. Our offer includes three systems: KÖMMERLING 76 AD, KÖMMERLING 76 MD, KÖMMERLING 88 MD. Each of the offered systems is available in white, veneered, as well as with innovative aluminium overlays. Please feel free to take a closer look at our offer.

3.title: ALUMINIUM WINDOWS – Aliplast profile
3.description: ALUMINIUM WINDOWS from Poland, based on the WINDOW PROFILES by ALIPLAST, available in the Imperial, Superial and Star systems, are characterised by extreme rigidness, high-quality coating, excellent thermal insulation, and modern, varied designs. ALUMINIUM WINDOWS and DOORS by Tur-Plast from Poland were created thanks to many years of experience and the use of modern technology.

4.title: ALUMINIUM WINDOWS – Aluron Profiles
4.description: Windows made in Poland based on aluminium profiles from ALURON fulfil the rigorous energy-efficiency requirements, provide safety as well as comfort and functionality of use. As a manufacturer of windows based in Poland, we offer a range of non-standard and unusual solutions. Please feel free to contact us.

windowsElementsList.title: WINDOWS ELEMENTS
windowsElementsList.description: Profile systems are important in window construction. However, there are a number of components of window joinery that largely affect energy efficiency, safety and comfort in the daily use of our windows. The type of glazing, fittings and seals used largely determines the quality of the windows. The visual aspect of window joinery, in turn, is strongly influenced by the choice of mullions, colours, or additional window accessories.

1.title: Glazing units for windows
1.description: A significant element of any PVC window are panes. Depending on the size of the window and on the division into panels, the glass can occupy from 25% to 95% of the window area. Therefore, it is the quality and parameters of the glazing units that determine whether and how the window will fulfil its function – which is ensuring the best thermal insulation, safety, and sound insulation.

2.title: Window fittings and seals
2.description: While being a very inconspicuous element of a window structure, seals are in fact responsible for extremely important properties, such as thermal insulation; water tightness; room ventilation; sound insulation.

3.title: Window mullions
3.description: To emphasise the character of the windows, elevation, or even the whole building, we offer PVC windows and aluminium windows with mullions. This applies especially to older or stylized buildings. Mullions may be structural, inter-pane or Viennese.

4.title: Colour palette for window profiles
4.description: Please see the palette of sample colours in which we manufacture windows. The advantages of our veneered windows include: the possibility of choosing between veneering on one or both sides; elegant and harmonious appearance; extreme resistance to changing weather conditions; no need for additional special maintenance, and ease of care.

5.title: Window accessories / additions
5.description: Please feel free to view our offer of all kinds of accessories and additions for PVC and aluminium windows.

windowsillsList.title: WINDOWSILLS
windowsillsList.description: In the comprehensive offer from TUR-PLAST, you will find solid and thermally insulated internal and external windowsills.

1.title: Internal windowsills
1.description: Möller LIGNODUR internal windowsills are impact-resistant and scratch-resistant interior finishing elements for both older and modern buildings. What sets them apart from competing products is the guaranteed thickness of walls and reinforcements embossed in the form of a strong core made of a wood flour and PVC composite.

2.title: External windowsills
2.description: We offer steel and aluminium external windowsills. Please feel free to take a closer look at our offer.

3.title: Thermally insulated window moulding
3.description: We recommend taking a moment to see our offer of thermally insulated window moulding as well as external, internal and double-sided XPS profiles. With layered installation of energy-efficient windows, it is also worthwhile to make sure you have a thermally insulated windowsill.

WindowsPVCSchucoPage.title: PVC WINDOWS – Schüco Profiles
WindowsPVCSchucoPage.subtitle: / Excellent energy efficiency thanks to innovative technology /
WindowsPVCSchucoPage.description: Schüco window profiles are made of very high-strength material. We use reinforcement with corrosion-resistant 1.5-2mm thick steel sections around the entire perimeter of the frame and sash. A window construction that is this stable and durable perfectly withstands the weight of the quite heavy energy-efficient triple glazing unit, and has excellent thermal and sound insulation.

ProfilesImg.title: In our offer you will find the following types of Schüco profiles:

ProfilesScheme.title: Schüco Windows – profile LivIng 82 MD and AD Classic
ProfilesScheme.description: Schüco Living 82 MD and AS is a new generation of window and door systems for modern construction. The use of the innovative TWIN system allows the frame with double (AS series) or triple (MD series) sealing to be easily fitted to the window sash. In addition, this new twin system uses the world’s first EPDM heat seal. Schüco, thanks to cooperation with Semperit, has exclusive rights to this type of sealing technology. It is due to the use of flexible and heat-sealable material that the tightness in windows and doors has increased significantly, especially in problematic corner areas.

ProfilesSchemeAluminium.title: Schüco Windows – with aluminium overlays – TOP ALU

1.description: Our standard offer of window joinery manufactured in Poland has been supplemented with PVC windows with aluminium overlays. We produce them based on a Schüco window constructed in the CT70 or LivIng 82 MD / AS system in the CLASSIC style. The elegant aluminium overlays allow optimal adjustment of windows to the facade. The rich RAL colour palette will satisfy even the most demanding tastes, and the possible colour variation between the frame and the sash broadens this range of possibilities even further. Overlays work especially in modern buildings, commercial and service premises, or office buildings. The use of aluminium overlays makes the PVC windows unique.

ProfilesSchemeNordic.title: Schüco Windows – profile Alu Inside NORDIC

1.description: The Scandinavian Windows system, with outward-opening windows, has been designed especially for the Scandinavian and North German markets. A characteristic feature of this system are windows that open outwards and have the highest stability and excellent thermal insulation parameters. This system allows the implementation of windows with glazing bars characteristic for the region, stylish glazing beads and special fittings (ASSA ABLOY) with various opening methods, such as turn fittings, Top-Hung or Top-Swing fittings. The Schüco Alu Inside Nordic window system is certified by the Danish Technological Institute.

WindowsPVCKommerlingPage.title: PVC WINDOWS – Kömmerling Profiles
WindowsPVCKommerlingPage.subtitle: / Best-in-class energy-efficient and fully eco-friendly window systems /
WindowsPVCKommerlingPage.description: We recommend the energy-efficient and eco-friendly window systems from the German company KÖMMERLING. Our offer includes three systems: KÖMMERLING 76 AD, KÖMMERLING 88 MD. Each of the offered systems is available in white, veneered, as well as with innovative aluminium overlays.

OfferSection.title: PLEASE FEEL FREE TO TAKE A CLOSER LOOK AT OUR OFFER:

cardItem.title: ECONOMICAL SOLUTION
cardItem.alt: Private house with large white windows

ProfilesCrossSections.title: Cross-sections of windows made of Kömmerling profiles.

1.title: EXCLUSIVE WINDOWS FOR HIGH EXPECTATIONS – structure of window profiles
1.desc: New generation of profiles – KÖMMERLING 76 – moves the horizon. KÖMMERLING 76 system is the result of the wealth of experience, many years of research and development, latest structures and computer simulations, numerous trials and tests. KÖMMERLING 76 is the best window system in its class! Window profiles of KÖMMERLING company feature innovative structure of chambers, which designed under latest technical solutions, perfectly influence better thermal and acoustic insulation and optimal stability of structure altogether with high carrying capacity especially for the application of heavy window panes. Manufacturers of window profiles KÖMMERLING 76 pay special attention to ecological issues. The best functionality and exceptional thermal insulation at optimal use of materials. KÖMMERLING has long believed in the “greenline” idea, i.e. to produce PVC windows harmful lead may be replaced by ecological lime/zinc.

2.title: PVC WINDOW PROFILES MANUFACTURER – KÖMMERLING company
2.desc: Manufacturer of KÖMMERLING window systems is appreciated for high quality of the products and continuous implementation of innovative technologies.KÖMMERLING company was started in 1897 by Karl Kömmerling. Before PVC window profiles were produced the company had offered glues and synthetic resin. In 1957 the company started to produce PVC shutter rollers, and in 1967 it began to mould PVC window profiles of the highest quality.Long-term experience made KÖMMERLING company the market leader.

1.description: The 5-chamber KÖMMERLING 76 AD window profile in our offer has very good thermal insulation parameters: the value of the thermal transmittance coefficient Uf in the standard variant is up to 1.1 W/m2K, while Uw for the reference window is up to 0.76 W/m2K.

ProfilesScheme3.title: Kömmerling Windows AluClip – with aluminium overlays

1.description: The specially designed aluminium overlays for PVC window and door profiles are an innovative solution with excellent technical parameters, representing a beneficial alternative to aluminium windows. Aluminium is characterised by elegance, the best resistance to changing weather conditions, high stability, ease of care, and unlimited colour range – thanks to the techniques of refining the external surface, i.e. anodizing or powder coating. In turn, PVC plastic guarantees optimal thermal and sound insulation as well as high functionality. KÖMMERLING 76 offers a unique combination of the advantages of aluminium and PVC plastic in the form of innovative Alu Clip, Alu Clip Pro and AddOn systems. Our solutions mean that the design possibilities are unlimited, and the windows meet the highest energy-efficiency requirements!

WindowsAluAliplastPage.title: ALUMINIUM WINDOWS – Aliplast profile
WindowsAluAliplastPage.description: We offer aluminium windows based on high-quality Aliplast aluminium systems, which together with the precise joining technology ensure appropriate parameters of thermal and sound insulation as well as water and air tightness. All Aliplast aluminium systems offered by the window and door manufacturer TUR-PLAST have relevant documentation allowing their use in construction. The obtained technical approvals, hygienic approvals, ITT tests, confirming the high parameters of Aliplast products compliant with European standards, make for an offer satisfactory for the most demanding customers.

OfferAluSection.title: Please feel free to learn about our offer of aluminium profiles:

Therefore, in our offer you will find profiles varnished with all types of powder coating in the entire range of RAL colours, as well as varnished with special effects such as fine or thick structure with a metallic effect.

WindowsGlassPage.title: Glazing units for windows from PCV and Aluminium
WindowsGlassPage.description: A significant element of any PVC window are panes. Depending on the size of the window and on the division into panels, the glass can occupy from 25% to 95% of the window area. Therefore, it is the quality and parameters of the glazing units that determine whether and how the window will fulfil its function – which is ensuring the best thermal insulation, safety, and sound insulation.

description.p1: KNOW THE DESIGN OF YOUR WINDOW PACKAGE
description.p2: The TUR-PLAST company uses glazing packs of the prestigious SAINT-GOBAIN company. The glazing packs include one-, two- or three-chamber sets. The thermoflat panes in a pack can be 4mm, 6mm or 8mm thick, divided with a steel distance frame or the so called warm frame (SGG SWISSPACER). The space between panes in a pack, in order to obtain lower heat transmission coefficient, is filled with gas – argon or krypton.

1.title: Ug – Heat transmission
1.description: The Ug coefficient informs us about the amount of heat which will be lost in certain conditions. The lower the coefficient, the less heat will be through a glass pane.

2.title: g – Energy permeability
2.description: A glass pane constitutes a barrier for the solar power. That is why, it is important to use such glass panes which let in maximum amount of the power. The higher the rate the more additional energy we have to heat the interior of a building.

3.title: Lt – Light permeability
3.description: Thanks to high Lt rate more light is let in and hence, less electric energy is needed to light a building.

4.title: Rw – Acoustic insulation
4.description: Acoustic insulation of a given glazing pack is expressed with the Rw coefficient. It is measured in specialist acoustic laboratories. The acoustic insulation coefficient Rw of glass panes may reach the level of 28-53 dB.

1.title: Energy-saving panes
1.description: The panes are covered with low-emission coatings of noble metal oxides which role is to permit maximum amount of light and solar power (g, Lt) and at the same time, effectively prevent heat loss from room (Ug). Energy efficiency of complex glass panes depends on several factors, such as: quality of the heat insulation coating, number of glass panes in a pack, the gas filling the space between panes and the SWISSPACER warm distance frame. Thanks to the glazing packs of this type, it is possible to reduce heat energy consumption which results in lower energy bills.

2.title: Secure panes
2.description: We offer two solutions: Panes with the STADIP laminated glass – in the case of breaking the pane, the foil keeps glass pieces together to reduce the risk of injuries. Panes with the SECURIT hardened glass – they are characterised by five times higher resistance to strikes e.g. by a ball or a person. In the case of breaking, the panes break into small blunt-edged pieces which do not cause serious body injuries. The described glazing pack, reducing the risk of injuries in the case of breaking the pane, is used e.g. in the places where children usually play or where people practise sport.

3.title: Anti-burglary panes
3.description: The pane consists of two or more sheets of glass with a few layers of the PVB foil (polyvinyl butyral) in between, which is highly resistant to tearing. In the case of breaking, the product reduces the risk of falling into the interior of a building. As a default, the security pane is thicker than the other pane in a pack which, together with the applied PVB foil, improves its noise-absorbing properties. Whats is more, the product perfectly filters most of the UV rays and hence, it can be used in the places exposed to fading under the influence of the sun’s rays (shop windows, exhibitions, galleries).

4.title: Noise-absorbing panes
4.description: A noise-absorbing glass pane provides both high thermal and acoustic insulation. Outer side of the noise-absorbing glass pane pack is covered with laminated glass made of two sheets and one or more layers of the acoustic foil in between. The foil suppresses noise, and at the same time, if the pane breaks, it keeps the pieces together. The noise-absorbing glass panes are recommended particularly for the people who live in noisy surroundings. The SGG CLIMALPLUS SILENCE glass panes suppress the noise within the scope of 29 to 52 dB.

5.title: Ornamental panes
5.description: The SGG DECORGLASS is ornamental glass, colourless or mass-coloured. It is perfect for interiors as it makes them lighter and at the same time, gives the feeling of privacy. We offer a wide range of patterns which go well with both the residential and non-residential interiors. The glass can be used, among others: in partition walls, sliding walls, glass and glazed doors, windows, shower cubicles, desks, tables, counters, shelves, urban street furniture.

6.title: Self-cleaning panes
6.description: The SGG BIOCLEAN self-cleaning pane consists of an outer glass covered with an invisible mineral substance (silicon oxide) of high durability. Dirt is removed from the outer surface of the pane thanks to the combined action of the day light UV rays and water. The self-cleaning panes are recommended particularly for glazing the places which are directly exposed to sun light and rain: facades, winter gardens and roofs.

WindowsFittingsSealsPage.title: Glazing units for windows from PCV and Aluminium

gaskets.subTitle: top-class window seals – made of EPDM

1.description: Quality depends on details – the saying is perfectly right if we talk about window joinery. Even though profiles and glass units offer excellent performance but the applied seals are of poor quality or are improperly fixed – the WINDOWS are worthless. Seals seem to be minor window elements, but in fact they determine very important parameters including:

1.desc: thermal insulation;

2.desc: water-tightness;

3.desc: ventilation;

4.desc: acoustic insulation.

2.description: Our seals are highly resistant to weather conditions, and they are also ductile, and hence resistant to deformation. These are the qualities of the material used for manufacturing the seals – synthetic rubber, commonly known as EPDM. This is why, our EPDM seals can be described as:

1.desc: resistant to ageing;

2.desc: resistant to changing weather conditions;

3.desc: performing well in the temperature between -40 and +110 C degrees;

4.desc: resistant to humidity, steam or UV radiation;

5.desc: highly elastic;

6.desc: resistant to cracks and deformation;

fittings.subTitle: MACO MULTI-MATIC – a new generation of fittings

card.title: WINDOWS FITTINGS
card.description: Fittings in a window structure are responsible for proper opening and closing of a window sash. Window fittings allow to set different sash positions: side-hung, tilt, turn-tilt, slide-tilt, slide-fold. When buying windows, one needs to take into account if a given solution offers significantly better performance in terms of security, functioning and comfort. TUR-PLAST uses window fittings produced by the reputable MACO company. The products offer security and reliability for many years.

FittingsFeaturesSection.title: Characteristic features of the MACO MULTI-MAC fittings include:

1.title: SAFEGUARD AGAINST FAULTY CONTROL
1.description: The MACO company is one of the first manufacturers who equipped standard fittings with the mechanism blocking window operation in the case of faulty handle position. It is integrated with the sash lifter which has been improved even further. The mechanism prevents the so called „sash slip” from the top hinge, which frequently causes client complaints.

2.title: ADDITIONAL TILT SETTING FOR „SLOT VENTILATION”
2.description: The function allows to leave small slot between the window frame and sash which guarantees continuous, controlled inflow of fresh air. The micro-ventilation function is entirely integrated with the stay; when switching to the tilt setting at 45 o, the sash stands out approximately 10-13 mm; The ventilation setting is not affected by draught or wind.

3.title: ADJUSTABLE i.S SECURITY CAMS – intelligent security
3.description: The security cams are equipped with their own pressure control and hence: seal windows tightly reduce costs; distinguish our windows from the products offered by the competition. When you choose TUR-PLAST windows, you receive fittings with security cams resistant to break-ins, mounted all around the window frame.

4.title: DUMMY SASH GEAR PROTECTING AGAINTS BREAK-INS
4.description: A perfect solution for comfortable and secure windows. Comfortable to operate. Only two hardware components.

5.title: UNIFROM SIILVER-LOOK COATING AND CONNECTING EDGE COVER PROVIDING PROTECTION AGAINST CORROSION
5.description: MACO is the first manufacturer who, since 2000, has been applying silver passivation treatments with electro-zinc coating, free of Chromium (VI), and wax coating without using silicate. The changes improved the protective qualities of the fitting surface and eliminated the use of Chromium (VI). Steel fitting elements are coated with zinc, chromium or wax.

6.title: DOOR SNAPPER FOR BALCONY DOORS
6.description: The snapper keeps the sash in the frame without the need to use the window handle. It turns off automatically if the sash is in the tilt position. Adjustable height.

7.title: PERFECT IN ALL DETAIL: INNER CENTRAL COMPRESSION LOCK
7.description: The contact pressure can easily be adjusted with i.S. cams and hence, they: seal the window tightly, save heating costs, ensure satisfied customers distinguish our windows from the products offered by the competition.

8.title: 3D HINGE REGULATED IN THREE DIRECTIONS
8.description: The set of bottom hinges can be regulated in three directions (height adjustment, side adjustment and compression setting). The stays allow to lower and lift sashes and to adjust contact pressure.

9.title: SECURE TILT POSITION
9.description: Basic security at window’s most critical point. No special striker plate needed. Protection against levering up, also in the tilt position.

10.title: i.S. STRIKER PLATES
10.description: A special composition of high-quality materials and specialist casting procedures ensure complete stability. The fittings are screwed into the frame reinforcement.

11.title: FITTING PARTS WHICH ARE RESISTANT TO BREAK-INS CAN BE EASILY FIXED
11.description: Should increased window security be desired at a later date, it is very easy to change the standard striker plates for the i.S. security striker plates thanks to identical screw positions.The standard fittings have two security points. The fittings of class Wk1 have four security striker plates. The fittings of class Wk 2, however, have between 8 and 10 i.S. security striker plates.

card.description: In order to highlight the character of a window, an elevation, or even the particular features of the whole building, we offer muntin windows. These are highly recommended for stylized houses and buildings of the past whose casements used to be split into smaller units because of construction factors and limitations. Consequently, we have included windows with muntins in our offer too. Larger glass surfaces are naturally a better choice to complete modern interiors; nevertheless custom-made muntins can be successfully used with present day architecture.Wide, structural or glass bond muntins should be applied with care since they reduce the amount of light that is let in, affect thermal insulation, and create some difficulties in cleaning panes.

MuntinTypesSection.title: We can distinguish the following muntin types:

1.title: STRUCTURAL MUNTINS
1.description: Structural muntins which constitute a part of the window frame and divide the glass pane into smaller, adjacent panes. Their finishing is identical to that of the window frames. Our windows consist of standard transoms and vertical dividers 91 mm wide (the cross pattern is very popular – it splits the window pane into 4 pane units in 1,2 or 4 casements). If the glass should be broken, only one small pane has to be replaced as opposed to single glass pane windows where the entire pane needs to be removed and replaced.

2.title: BETWEEN THE PANES MUNTINS
2.description: Between the panes muntins are made of aluminium or PVC and placed in spaces between the insulating glass panes. Their colour can match that of the window frames, but they can also be produced in gold or silver options. They are usually supplied in widths of 8, 18, 26 or 45 mm. This type are considered the most convenient type whilst it comes to washing the windows.

3.title: VIENNA MUNTINS
3.description: Vienna muntins are glued onto the glazing surface. In our windows these are made of PVC with sealed finished edges. The use of a spacing frame inside the glazing unit, imitates the pattern typical for structural muntins. They are available in two widths: 25 and 37 mm. The Venice muntins, which are more popular for wooden windows, provide a similar solution to the Vienna ones. In this case, however, the muntins are glued onto the glazing pane, but neither seal nor distance frame are used.

WindowsColoursPage.description: When choosing windows and doors, one of the things to think about is the choice of colours. Below we present our colour offers for window and door profiles for both PVC Schüco and Kömmerling as well as aluminium Aliplast and Aluron.

1.description: Colour palette for window profiles – Schüco

2.description: Colour palette for window profiles – Kömmerling

4.description: Colour palette for window profiles – Aliplast

WindowHandlesDublin.title: NEW – DUBLIN window handles
WindowHandlesDublin.description: In the offer of the Window and Door Manufacturer TUR-PLAST you will find handles from the DUBLIN Medos collection, featuring futuristic and timeless designs. The handle part is made of aluminium. Available in a classic finish (powder coating) or a modern finish (anodising available in two variants: sandblasted or brushed). We offer versions with a button and a key as well as Dublin de Luxe – elegant thanks to unique cutting.

WindowHandlesSecustic.title: Window handles Secustic – FKS i HOPPE
WindowHandlesSecustic.description: For white windows we use aesthetic white handles of the renowned FKS company. For the windows with double-sided veneer we choose handles of the HOPPE company, which offer ergonomic and elegant design.

1.description: The SECOUSTIK type – the handle is equipped with a patented blocking mechanism preventing any possible manipulation from the outside by moving the boundary fitting. The characteristic click sound at turning the handle signals that the security function is active.

2.description: SECURE HANDLE WITH A PUSH BUTTON –  the handle can be turned only after pressing the button – it prevents opening a window from the outside, it is a standard option in WK-1 type anti-burglary fittings, and is equipped with an anti-drilling plate as well.

3.description: ANTI-BURGLARY HANDLE (with a key) – removing the key blocks the door- handle, which cannot be turned – it protects against possible window opening from the outside, it is a standard option in anti-burglary fittings of the WK-2 type. This door- handle type, similarly to the push-button one, is recommended for upstairs balcony doors so as to prevent them from being opened by children.

DoorsPage.title: EXTERIOR DOORS from Poland
DoorsPage.description: All doors produced by the Polish-based company VI-3 feature solid construction, great thermal performance, and innovative solutions. We make PVC exterior doors based on solid profiles: Schüco CT70, Schüco LivIng, and Kömmerling 76AD. Our aluminium doors are made with profiles from the Belgian company Aliplast as well as Polish aluminium systems from Aluron. Our offer includes terrace and balcony doors made on a window or door profile; unusual doors, practically in any designed shape, as well as folding doors – a great solution for restaurants, cafés and modern living rooms.

1.title: PVC Doors – Schüco Profiles
1.description: The doors are made of high-impact, deformation-resistant PVC from the renowned company Schüco. Good thermal insulation is ensured by multi-chamber profiles, while steel reinforcements of a large size and optimal thickness contribute to the stiffness and stability of the product.

2.title: PVC Doors – Kömmerling Profiles
2.description: Choosing the right door significantly affects the visual effect of any house, giving it a specific character. With the innovative KÖMMERLING 76 AD door system, we are able to design any door structure that meets the individual needs of each client. Please feel free to take a closer look at our set of ready-made door fillings with the highest properties.

3.title: ALUMINIUM Doors – Aliplast Profiles
3.description: We produce aluminium doors based on Aliplast profiles. These systems are characterised by excellent stiffness, high-quality coatings and modern design. Thanks to the use of special thermal inserts, we obtain very high thermal insulation parameters.

4.title: ALUMINIUM Doors – Aluron Profiles
4.description: The aluminium systems of the thriving Polish company Aluron are modern constructions intended for the production of very well thermally insulated doors. The use of the innovative ANTI-BI-METAL technology prevents the door leaves from deforming when heated by sunlight, as well as at very low temperatures.

5.title: Balcony/Terrace Doors
5.description: The doors are built on a stable standard-width or wider window frame and are intended for apartments in blocks of flats and exits to balconies in houses where it is not possible or necessary to enter from the outside. Our terrace doors feature a low threshold, solid Dr. Hahn hinges, a three-point latch locked with a handle, the possibility of using a second lock and safe locking elements and, most importantly, two types of opening: to the inside as a balcony door or to the outside as an entrance door.

6.title: Folding Doors
6.description: The use of folding doors in rooms with large glazing is very convenient because they open to the side, without creating any barriers to the passage, in the form of posts or fixed leaves. Especially in houses surrounded by large gardens, with this glass and aluminium retractable wall we are able to obtain maximum contact with the beautiful green surroundings. Folding doors are often used in hotels, shops, and private homes where there is a need to create more usable space.

doorsFeatures.title: DOOR FEATURES
doorsFeatures.description: The wide range of exclusive door fillings as well as panels from companies such as Paneldoor and Veyna, the extensive selection of door accessories, and the fulfilment of the highest standards ensure that Polish doors purchased from Tur-Plast will serve you for many years.

1.title: Door Fillings – Panels for PVC and Aluminium Doors
1.description: Door fillings may be: inset or overlay; made of laminated boards or aluminium; decorated with various frames, glass elements, inlays, cuttings or appliqués; in any chosen colour and structure. The door fillings in our offer are characterised by high resistance to mechanical damage, difficult weather conditions, and noise. With the wide selection of designs, colours and variety of glazing, even the most demanding customers are able to choose a filling they are fully satisfied with.

2.title: Accessories / Additions for PVC and Aluminium Doors
2.description: As a producer and seller of doors, we know that all kinds of accessories are often very important. Our market systematically provides us with sets of newer and more practical solutions. There is a whole variety of handles, pulls, letterboxes, peepholes, and panes, all different in terms of technical parameters and style. Some accessories can be selected for classic buildings, and others for modern ones. Please feel free to view our systematically expanded offer of door accessories.

PVCDoorsSchucoPage.title: EXTERIOR DOORS from PVC – Schüco profiles

description.p1: The doors are made of high-impact, deformation-resistant PVC from the renowned company Schüco. Good thermal insulation is ensured by multi-chamber profiles, while steel reinforcements of a large size and optimal thickness contribute to the stiffness and stability of the product.
description.p2: The structure of the profiles gives us the possibility of installing multi-point locks and reinforced locking elements. This type of solution ensures we obtain safe doors with a long service life. Our exterior doors made of PVC have a low aluminium threshold with a thermal break.
description.p3: The door leaf filling consists of two sandwich panels made of plastic, separated by polyurethane foam, which ensures very good thermal insulation of the door. Door panels can be enriched with various types of glass and ornamental frames. The surface layer of PVC panels is covered with high-quality acrylic films or varnishes, resistant to weather conditions and UV rays. In addition to the models of door fillings presented in our galleries, we are happy to make doors according to your individual project.

description.p1: The doors are built on a stable standard-width or wider window frame and are intended for apartments in blocks of flats and exits to balconies in houses where it is not possible or necessary to enter from the outside. A modification of this solution is the use of a low aluminium threshold, which does not constitute a barrier for children, wheelchairs, etc.The handle is only mounted from the inside. Some practical additions to these balcony doors include a mini-pull with a latch and a brake in the handle. The first allows you to close the door from the outside, and the other – to lock it in a specific opening position.An intermediate solution between a balcony door and a terrace (entrance) door is a balcony door on a wide leaf with a handle on each side and a lock.
description.p2: The glazing units for balcony and terrace doors are designed to achieve the highest possible strength. For this purpose, the following are most often used:– toughened glass – SECURIT, which is five times stronger than ordinary glass and, if broken, breaks into many small pieces with unsharp edges.
description.p3: – or glued glass – STANDIP, with one or more layers of PVB foil, which, in case of breakage, keeps the glass fragments in place.
description.p4: With the use of this type of glazing units, the resistance of balcony and terrace doors to various external forces is significantly increased.

description.p1: The Polish-based company TUR-PLAST produces ALUMINIUM FOLDING DOORS based on the three-chamber, thermally insulated PANORAMA system by ALIPLAST. This product makes the offer more attractive as it gives architects and individual clients a greater choice in the interior design of houses and business premises.
description.p2: The use of folding doors in rooms with large glazing is very convenient because they open to the side, without creating any barriers to the passage, in the form of posts or fixed leaves. Especially in houses surrounded by large gardens, with this glass and aluminium retractable wall we are able to obtain maximum contact with the beautiful green surroundings. Folding doors are often used in hotels, shops, and private homes where there is a need to create more usable space.

1.desc: A three-chamber thermally insulated door system designed for the construction of folding doors;

2.desc: Two possible types of the threshold system: a system with a flat threshold and brush sealing or a tight threshold based on a complete frame along the perimeter of the entire terrace window;

3.desc: Depending on the requirements and application, the Panorama system offers inward-opening or outward-opening structures in a very large configuration of leaves (2+1, 3+2, 3+3);

4.desc: New integrated fittings: a hinge with a bottom carriage, a hinge with a pull, and low handles improve the functionality of the structure, while reducing the size of the complex folding door structure;

5.desc: The minimised visual width of the profile used in the system makes the folding door seem light;

6.desc: The Panorama system is available in a version with increased thermal insulation – thanks to the use of additional thermal inserts on the perimeter and between the breaks of the door leaf as well as the frames; available options: Panorama, Panorama i+;

7.desc: The folding door system allows for the creation of a nice-looking and functional structure, comfortable for users, but also provides the possibility of very effective use of the space in the building;

8.desc: The wide range of available solutions and potential applications enables the design of structures for balconies, terraces or winter gardens as well as public utility buildings and commercial facilities;

9.desc: possibility of varnishing according to the RAL palette (Qualicoat 1518), in the wood structure – Aliplast Wood Colour Effect (Qualideco PL-0001), anodised finish (Qualanod 1808), also bi-colour.

DoorPanelsPage.title: DOOR FEATURES – Door Fillings – Panels for PVC and Aluminium Doors
DoorPanelsPage.description: The door leaf filling consists of two sandwich panels made of plastic, separated by polyurethane foam. This combination ensures very good thermal insulation of the door. The panels can be enriched with various types of glass and ornamental frames. The surface layer of PVC panels is covered with high-quality acrylic films or varnishes, resistant to weather conditions and UV rays.

1.description: Choose from the classic Schüco palette, which offers a wide range of colors for any style and design. Thanks to the Qualicoat 1518 certification, your door will retain its rich color and shine for many years.

2.title: PVC Doors – Kömmerling Profiles
2.description: Choose naturalness with the Kömmerling Wood Color Effect palette, which gives your door a refined look of wood texture. This option, certified by Qualideco PL-0001, perfectly matches the aesthetics of natural wood with the strength of aluminum.

The panels are made of high-quality materials, which guarantees their durability and resistance to environmental influences.

AccessoriesPage.title: DOOR FEATURES – Accessories and Additions for PVC and Aluminium Doors.

description.p1: Choosing the right door significantly affects the visual effect of any house, giving it a specific character. With the innovative KÖMMERLING 76 AD door system, we are able to design any door structure that meets the individual needs of each client. Please feel free to take a closer look at the set of ready-made door fillings with the highest properties offered by the Polish-based door manufacturer TUR-PLAST.

SlidingDoorsPage.title: SLIDING TERRACE DOORS from Poland
SlidingDoorsPage.description: Sliding terrace doors are an ideal solution for modern and large interiors. They have a lot of glazing, making them able to optimally light up the room. They have very good thermal insulation (no thermal bridges), and thanks to the modern fittings technology, we can experience real comfort and joy from using large sliding doors. The solutions proposed by Tur-Plast are an alternative to standard double-leaf balconies. Our offer includes solid and exclusive lift-and-slide terrace doors made of PVC and aluminium.

1.title: PVC Sliding Terrace Doors - HS Type - Schüco Profiles
1.description: We recommend Schüco ThermoSlide and EasySlide lift-and-slide doors. Even very large wings can be moved easily. The flat and triple-insulated threshold increases the comfort of use and eliminates the risk of a „cold area” at the floor.

2.title: PVC Sliding Terrace Doors - HS Type - Kömmerling Profiles
2.description: The exclusive PremiDoor 76 lift-and-slide doors recommended in our offer provide exceptional living comfort. The door leaf moves smoothly and noiselessly along the guides. The excellent-quality seals ensure optimal wind- and water-tightness and protects against external noise. In this system, we obtain the highest parameters of thermal insulation.

3.title: PVC Sliding Terrace Doors - PSK Type - Schüco Profiles
3.description: Our offer includes the currently popular PSK sliding doors (Parallel-Schiebe-Kipp-Tür – parallel-slide-and-tilt doors). These types of structures are built using standard window profiles. After turning the handle from the closed position, the leaf extends into the room, perpendicular to the window plane, and then slides to the side. The door also has a leaf tilt function.

4.title: PVC Sliding Terrace Doors - PSK Type - Kömmerling Profiles
4.description: We produce PSK-type sliding terrace doors which are an attractive alternative to typical balcony doors. This system allows you to save space that is needed when opening traditional balcony or terrace doors. The PSK doors based on Kömmerling PVC profiles have the option of tilting the leaf in addition to sliding.

5.title: ALUMINIUM Sliding Terrace Doors - HS Type - Aliplast Profiles
5.description: A modern structure; the use of lift-and-slide fittings in the innovative UltraGlide aluminium system with a low threshold is an excellent solution improving the accessibility of buildings for disabled people. It is possible to use colours from the RAL colour palette, structural colours, wood-like colours, anode, bicolour.

6.title: ALUMINIUM Sliding Terrace Doors - HS Type - Aluron Profiles
6.description: The aluminium lift-and-slide doors based on the AS 178HS system is a combination of innovative solutions with modern design, creating a new generation of all-glass lift-and-slide doors. With this system, it is possible to build large movable terrace glazing with a low and warm threshold. Its construction mechanisms enable safe and comfortable sliding of heavy leaves, manually or automatically.

SlidingDoorsHsSchPage.title: PVC SLIDING TERRACE DOORS - HS Type - Schüco Profiles
SlidingDoorsHsSchPage.description: PERFECT CONNECTION BETWEEN INTERIOR AND SURROUNDINGS… Schüco EasySlide and Schüco LivIngSlide lift-and-slide doors fill the interior with natural light and provide a beautiful view. The solutions offered by the Polish-based manufacturer TUR-PLAST enable the best use of usable space for work and rest. Energy-saving HS sliding doors are the key to new open spaces where the winter garden smoothly flows into the living space, and the balcony or terrace constitutes a collision-free extension of the usable space. Just move the glazed plane to the side, and the border between the indoor and outdoor space will disappear.

1.alt: Large panoramic glass sliding doors in the house

2.alt: Large panoramic glass sliding doors in the house

SlidingDoorsHsSchPage.desc2: SIX OPENING OPTIONS with one or two sliding leaves. This allows to fine-tune the woodwork to your individual requirements in terms of thermal insulation, dimensions and comfort of use.
SlidingDoorsHsSchPage.desc3: TWO SYSTEMS of lift-and-slide doors: Schüco EasySlide and Schüco LivIngSlide. TUR-PLAST is a Polish producer of individual solutions for HS-type sliding terrace doors with a low threshold. We offer comfort in a number of options. Thanks to the system and aesthetic compatibility and flexibility, sliding doors in the Schüco systems can be easily combined with energy-saving and passive Schüco windows.
SlidingDoorsHsSchPage.bannerTitle: PVC Sliding Terrace Doors – HS Schüco LivIngSlide

desc4.p1: THE NEWEST Schüco LivIngSlide lift-and-slide door system is precisely designed to meet all the restrictive criteria set for highly energy-efficient houses. Directly from the manufacturer – TUR-PLAST, these terrace doors achieve excellent thermal insulation results. With the use of glass pane with Ug = 0.6 W(m2K), the doors can achieve an excellent heat transfer coefficient, even up to Uw = 0.8 W(m2K).
desc4.p2: The leaves with a depth of 82 mm, multi-chamber profiles, a thermally insulated threshold and innovative, weldable EPDM seals provide the best protection against cold and against water vapour condensation, even in the sensitive corner area.
desc4.p3: The LivIng Slide doors are an investment that provides long-term benefits in the form of energy saving and perceptible comfort of use regardless of the season, even in strong winds with rain, as well as outside noise.

SlidingDoorsHsSchPage.bannerTitle2: PVC Sliding Terrace Doors – HS Schüco EasySlide

SlidingDoorsHsKomPage.description: PREMIDOOR 76 is an innovative system of slide-and-tilt doors with an installation depth of 76 mm. It allows for freedom in the arrangement of terraces, balconies and winter gardens. The large area of ​​glazing optically enlarges the room and provides optimal lighting of the interior. With our solutions, your house will open up to the greenery outside, and the door will perfectly fit into the atmosphere of the interior. Thanks to the modern barrier-free threshold, which is included as standard, you can enjoy maximum comfort and optimal thermal insulation.

komPremiCross.description: TWO VERSIONS TO CHOOSE FROM – PremiDoor 76 and PremiDoor 76 lux. Do you expect the best insulation and protection against noise and burglary? If so, the PremiDoor system is created just for you. We offer doors in the classic PremiDoor 76 system or in the PremiDoor 76 lux version which features an extremely narrow leaf profile.The unique structure and the slender profile of the leaf as well as the larger glass surface provide more warmth in the room thanks to the high solar radiation heat recovery.

installation.title: INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS for PremiDoor 76 and PremiDoor 76 lux
installation.description: THE BASE FOR HS Kömmerling PremiDoor 76 should be prepared in accordance with the instructions provided. If the base for the HS-type door is not properly prepared by the Customer, TUR-PLAST will not perform the installation. Therefore, the Customer should pay special attention to the quality of the concrete screed for the HS door. A water- and frost-resistant concrete mortar (B25 concrete) should be used. The surface should be perfectly stable, smooth and level.

SlidingDoorsPskSchPage.title: PVC SLIDING TERRACE DOORS - PSK Type - Schüco Profiles
SlidingDoorsPskSchPage.description: Our offer includes the popular PSK sliding doors (Parallel-Schiebe-Kipp-Tür - parallel-slide-and-tilt doors).These types of structures are built using standard window profiles. Moving the leaves is possible thanks to the use of a special fittings mechanism. After turning the handle from the closed position, the leaf extends into the room, perpendicular to the window plane, and then slides to the side. The door also has a leaf tilt function.

1.description: System Schüco CT70

2.description: System Schüco SI82

1.description: 2-panel - where the leaf moves onto the left or right fixed panel.

2.description: 3-panel - where the middle movable leaf moves onto the left or right fixed panel.

3.description: 4-panel - where the two middle leaves move onto the left and right permanent panels, respectively.

4.description: PSK-type doors are also produced, in which the leaves slide to the inside of the building wall. This solution allows to open the entire window opening. In this case, the fittings guide rails must be attached to the window frame and the inside surface of the building wall. The door frame must be installed flush with the internal plane of the building wall. The maximum dimensions of PSK door leaves are approximately 1600×2100 mm or 1400×2300 mm. The advantages of this solution include moderate pricing and high tightness. The disadvantages, in turn, are the high threshold in the form of a window frame as well as problems with opening and closing the leaves that may occur in the event of unskilful use.

pskTiltFit.title: PSK tilt-and-slide doors - parallel slide-and-tilt fittings by GU
pskTiltFit.description: With the PSK fittings, new possibilities open up in the production of terrace doors from standard window profiles. The technically advanced fittings offered by Gretsch-Unitas (G-U) ensure efficient and precise operation - also for heavy components. PSK fittings by GU meet the requirements for barrier-free construction according to DIN 18040. The fittings for large and heavy leaves are additionally equipped with latch forced control, which pulls the leaf along its entire width when closing, and brings it back to the sliding position when opening.

1.title: Innovative carriage technology.
1.description: The carriages slide lightly and reliably from tilt to sliding position.

2.title: Automatic Cleverle pin.
2.description: Various climatic conditions often make it necessary to adjust the locking bolts. The self-adjusting Cleverle pin adapts to variable groove space. This significantly reduces the need to make adjustments on the window.

3.title: Surface protection with ferGUard*silber.
3.description: All PSK hardware components are protected with ferGUard anti-corrosion coating. Three successive layers are applied in modern production plants.

4.title: The handle provides control of all functions

2.desc: All central locking elements are equipped with an automatic Cleverle pin which adjusts to the size of the groove space. Adjustments are made with a Torx key. This makes installation and maintenance easier, more practical and convenient.

3.desc: The choice of hooks defines the anti-burglary safety class.

4.desc: All locking elements in the frame are standard multi-point locking fittings.

5.desc: GU multi-point locking fittings can be equipped with control elements and connected to the alarm system.

6.desc: Optimum anti-corrosion protection with the ferGUard*silber coating. The technological process provides for a three-layer silver coating with an attractive appearance, which has become the standard for window fittings.

7.desc: Comfort and safety of use and operation regardless of the weight of the window. The innovative technology of the carriages enables precise movement of the leaf to any position and easy achievement of the tilt position.

8.desc: Solutions for barrier-free construction according to DIN 18040.

SlidingDoorsAluminumAliPage.description: Systems with increased thermal insulation for the design of sliding or lift-and-slide structures. The offered sliding structures based on Aliplast systems are intended for use in residential buildings, mainly individual and public buildings.
SlidingDoorsAluminumAliPage.desc: TWO SYSTEMS of HS-type aluminium sliding doors: Aliplast ULTRAGLIDE - option with a low threshold, angle solution and Aliplast VISOGLIDE plus. TUR-PLAST is a producer of individual solutions for HS-type aluminium sliding terrace doors with a low threshold. We offer comfort in a number of options. Thanks to the system and aesthetic compatibility and flexibility, sliding doors in the Aliplast aluminium systems can be easily combined with energy-saving and passive Aliplast windows.

description.p1: The aluminium lift-and-slide doors based on the AS 178HS system is a combination of innovative solutions with modern design, creating a new generation of all-glass lift-and-slide doors. With this system, it is possible to build large movable terrace glazing with a low and warm threshold. Its construction mechanisms enable safe and comfortable sliding of heavy leaves, manually or automatically. The use of fittings from reputable suppliers allows for comfortable sliding of even very heavy leaves.
description.p2: The AS 178HS system works well in buildings with large glazing, restaurants, or winter gardens, where key features include the ease of movement from inside the room to the outside, ease of use, design and aesthetics. An important advantage of this solution is the fact that it does not occupy the space of the interior and fits well in any arrangement. The innovative structure allows for the highest parameters of thermal insulation.
description.p3: In the AS 178HS system, it is possible to completely enclose the frame in the insulation layer, which allows to emphasise the decorative qualities of the façade and gives the building an individual and unique character. The structure can be made in all development schemes available on the market (a solution with two or three tracks, a solution with the possibility of using fixed glazing in passive leaves, etc.)

RollerBlindsPage.title: Roller Shutters / Sun Protection Covers
RollerBlindsPage.description: External roller shutters: top-mounted and adaptive, concealed and surface-mounted, are an effective way of saving energy. Our external roller shutters will provide you with great thermal and acoustic insulation as well as a sense of intimacy and safety. We offer external roller shutters in PVC or aluminium boxes, concealed or oval surface-mounted.

1.title: Adaptive External Roller Shutters
1.description: Adaptive roller shutters are installed primarily in buildings where windows have already been installed. However, many of our clients use this type of roller shutters in newly-built houses or in buildings where windows are being replaced.

2.title: Top-mounted External Roller Shutters
2.description: EXTE is our new versatile system of top-mounted roller shutters for installation on both sides, used in newly-built and renovated houses.

3.title: Screen (Reflexol) Covers
3.description: The screen-type roller shutter systems offered by Tur-Plast are perfect for protecting rooms with a lot of glazing from excessive insolation. In an extended position, the reflexol-type screens can also be a perfect barrier against insects and various types of pollution.

4.title: Accessories / Additions for Roller Shutters and Sun Protection Covers
4.description: When choosing roller shutters or sun protection covers, it is best to see the whole range of possible additional solutions that can significantly facilitate the operation and use of the products.

AdaptiveExternalPage.title: Adaptive External Roller Shutters – concealed and surface-mounted/roller shutters box made of aluminium/
AdaptiveExternalPage.description: Adaptive roller shutters are mounted in buildings with pre-mounted windows. But many our clients decide to mount these shutters for newly-erected houses or buildings where exchange of the windows is executed. We offer CONCEALED ADAPTIVE ROLLER SHUTTERS with two options of assembly and SURFACE-MOUNTED ADAPTIVE ROLLER SHUTTERS of an OVAL type. Characteristic feature of these systems are aluminium guides, housing and roller shutter box with a drain channel located outside the building.

1.desc: Roller shutter box 190 mm x 185 mm

2.desc: Maximum height – 2520 mm (height measured together with the box)

1.desc: very easy assembly;

2.desc: no negative effect on the energy balance of the building;

3.desc: possible to mount in the already existing buildings;

4.desc: rigid structure – the entire unit is made of aluminium (the slats, guiding channels and a rigid cassette of pressed aluminium);

GuideChannels.title: GUIDE CHANNELS in single and double execution

Housing.title: HOUSING – Lamele Aluprof PA 39
Housing.description:
PA 39 profile is one of the most popular aluminium profiles. It is so popular that the shutters made of this profile has been used in European houses for years now. Its main features are small width and tapering shape. It rolls up perfectly and fits to even small boxes. Thanks to the foam filling the profile inside, it is well insulated in terms of temperatures and noise. Small weight allows for manual drive, spring drive or electric operation. PA 39 is offered as a perforated version or plain in wide range of colours similar to RAL palette. The profiles are durable in terms of colour and resistance to wear-off. The profile is also resistant to the impact of atmospheric conditions.

Aluminium profiles belong to products which are ecologically clean. The foam inside is free of freon compounds and the paints do not contain cadmium.

TopMountedPage.title: Top-mounted External Roller Shutters
TopMountedPage.description: EXTE  is a new, universal roller blind system enabling either side mounting in newly built and renovated buildings. The most characteristic features of the system include:

1.desc: changing position of the inspection flap;

2.desc: at the bottom or at the back of the cassette, or as an alternative, outside of the building. Regardless of the flap position, the cassette capacity does not change;

3.desc: completely new assembly of drives and bearing of the roller blind;

4.desc: universal side guide rail, very easy mounting;

5.desc: division and adjustable rolling; window mosquito nets and unique solutions for door mosquito nets.

RSBoxSection.title: A ROLLER SHUTTER BOX – types
RSBoxSection.description: We offer two types of roller shutter boxes:

1.desc: EXPERT XT – roller shutter box 185mm x 220 mm, for the window of the height to 2300 mm (height measured together with the box).

2.desc: ELITE XT – roller shutter box 240mm x 220 mm, for the window of the height to 2800 mm (height measured together with the box). The system allows an additional mosquito net to be integrated within.

2.title: GUIDE CHANNELS in double execution

3.description: We have in the system matching inlet shoes and finishing plugs.

4.description: We have in the system matching inlet shoes and finishing plugs.

1.description: Simple adjustment of insulating filing

2.description: Special steel reinforcement for windows of the width above 1500 mm. Patented unique product of secure and gap-free joining.

3.description: EFFECTIVE THERMAL INSULATION – additional energy saving. The legal requirements regarding thermal insulation properties of cassettes in Germany are very strict. As the system is manufactured in this country, it is subject to the national regulations set in the Energy Saving Regulations (EnEV). According to the document, in new buildings, a blind cassette is considered to be a part of an external wall. In such a case, it is required to prove the accordance with the examples included in Appendix 2 of the DIN4108 standard. That is why, architects can do calculations taking into account a reduced heat transmission coefficient of a thermal bridge. The EXTE roller blind system provides excellent thermal insulation, according to applicable regulations.

1.desc: EXTERNAL COVERS (SCREENS) are modern window covers which perfectly protect rooms against excessive insolation and also against insects.

2.desc: Screens can be operated with a switch, remote control, but also mobile device.

3.desc: The advantages of SCREENS include the possibility of covering large areas, matching their appearance to the colours of the building, and selecting the degree of shading.

ScreensList.title: Roller Shutters / Sun Protection Covers
ScreensList.description: Screens represent a combination of functionality and convenience of use. Retrofitting the covers with weather automation and overload electric drives guarantees their years-long and trouble-free operation, while ensuring the comfort of daily use.

1.desc: Dimensions – Possibility to cover the surface up to a width of 5m or up to an area of 15m2;

2.desc: Operation – Via remote control, switch or mobile device;

3.desc: Available boxes – We offer boxes with dimensions of 95 mm, 105 mm, 125 mm;

4.desc: Colour palette – Any colour from the RAL palette;

5.desc: Fabric structure – Regular (Soltis) and diagonal (Serge, Nova);

AccessoriesRSPage.title: Accessories / Additions for Roller Shutters and Sun Protection Covers
AccessoriesRSPage.description: Accessories and additions for roller shutters and sun protection covers enhance both their functionality and aesthetic appeal. These supplementary components include items such as remote controls, manual cranks, and automated motors for seamless operation, as well as sensors that detect sunlight or wind to adjust covers automatically. Such features provide improved convenience, energy efficiency, and durability, making these systems adaptable to modern lifestyles and varying weather conditions.In addition to operational accessories, decorative elements like custom color options, frames, or specialized coatings can complement the design of any building. Accessories designed for sun protection covers may include adjustable brackets, side channels, or advanced fabrics with UV filtering, ensuring optimal light control and thermal insulation. Together, these additions elevate the usability and performance of roller shutters and sun protection solutions, catering to both residential and commercial needs.

ExternalRS.title: OPERATION OF EXTERNAL ROLLER SHUTTERS – options of use

1.title: Manual operation
1.description: Manual operation of roller shutter allows for winding up and down with the use of a retractor (pulling the tape or a rope) or a retractor with a crank handle. For external roller shutters each such option requires effort and time if it is used several times a day.

2.title: Electric operation
2.description: Electric operation. A drive – a very good quality of engine with mechanical limit switches – Motus Monos produced by NICE company. It has a noiseless gearshift and brakes.

3.title: Radio-operation
3.description: Radio-operation is powered by an advanced RolTop-868 engine with a built-in radio center, offering intelligent detection to stop and reverse motion upon encountering obstacles. The system features adjustable final positions, silent braking, and two-way communication with routing capabilities to ensure seamless remote control operation.

2.desc: Operating in a two-direction radio system.

3.desc: Signals confirming the reception of a command by a receiver.

4.desc: Available simple programming and the use of two intermediate positions.
